BoxLocalization.Label: Equidistant intervals attribute
BoxLocalization.Hint: Intervals of the same length; parameters are starting value and length of intervals

Socket.Name: Categories
Socket.Label: Categories
Socket.Hint: Categories set. Category value of attribute, it is defined by set of column values

Socket.Name: ClosedFrom
Socket.Label: Closed from
Socket.Hint: Intervals will be closed from this side

Socket.Name: Domain
Socket.Label: Domain
Socket.Hint: Decide if whole domain of column will be categoriezed or only some subdomain.

SelectOption.Name: SubDomainNumberOfValuesBounds
SelectOption.Label: Except frist (From) and last (To) values of actual Domain

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: AtomSetting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Atom setting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates a new coefficient setting box.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EquivalenceClass
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Class of equivalence
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Adds attribute to a new Class of Equivalence box.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: CategorialPartialCedentSetting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Categorial partial cedent setting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates a new categorial partial cedent box.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: Attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates a new attribute box for manual set-up.

Phrase.PhraseText: Equidistant Attribute does not support following column value sub types: DateTime, Time, Boolean, Unknown.
